website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for aspiring little chefs, as it has numerous fascinating components including a grill top, sink, oven, and shelves to keep kids engaged for hours of play.
pros: Garners enthusiasm for the adorable design that resembles a real BBQ grill
Fun working parts like knobs that turn and doors that open
Perfect height for toddlers, though taller kids can easily enjoy it, too
cons: Oven door can be a bit difficult to open and close
We wish it came with more play food items

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!!!! PARTS ARE NOT SAFE!!! DON'T BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: A TOTAL piece of junk!!! I'd love to give this barbeque NO stars!!!! The cookware has painted handles which comes off!!! (SEE PIC). I bought this for my grandson and we saw black all over his face. When we picked him up we discovered the paint from the frying pan had come off and was in his mouth and on his face. A Total DISAPPOINTMENT from Little Tikes. As gramma I now feel I put my own grandson in danger from a toy made by a company that is no longer concerned about child safety
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Connie

customer_reviews.title: Good toy for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Kiddo loves it! Easily assembled in about 40 minutes, including interruptions. We keep it outside but easily moves in doors when the kiddo wants us to change locations. Some small nit picky issues: wish it had a handle to help us move locations and hotdog/hamburger could be designed to stay in their buns (we have another set where they are stackable so stay locked in). Good value and good quality product. Wish I would of bought this sooner (purchased for 3 year old birthday).
customer_reviews.author: Newfmonster

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sous chef
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect! Shipped and delivered timely as promised, with all the parts and pieces!. Always wanted something like this for my son, never got to it. Now it's even better...it's for my grand son! Couldn't be more pleased! 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Joyful

customer_reviews.title: Grillin!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old daughter loves this!! She can cook on the grill just like daddy. It comes with a burger, a hotdog, some grilling tools and 2 cups. Its perfect for her age. We had a cookout recently where a few other kids were over and sure enough every time I looked over, someone different was "grilling" It was a big hit; perfect for ages 2-4 (just going from our experience)
customer_reviews.author: Eliza

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: What a great little unit! Well made, great features. My girls love this, they are 3.5 (although they are as tall as most 5 year olds). Intellectually and size wise for a normal height 3 year old it's perfect. It's a little short for them but they still love it and don't seem to care...I gave it 4 stars because it could definitely be taller for the age it lists for use. They will be too big for it next year but will have lots of fun with it this year :)
customer_reviews.author: Shantelle

customer_reviews.title: Grill spill
customer_reviews.text: I gave sturdiness a 3 cause it has already blown over from the wind 2 times (but we are from MN) it was missing holes in the back to secure it more and make it more sturdy. Also trying to secure the sink and cutting board was difficult. Our son loves this grill. He wants to play with it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Miles Zroka

customer_reviews.title: This is a great present
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 28 month old boy for Christmas and he absolutely loves it! Another 14 month old had a lot of fun playing with it as well. The dad of the 28 month old didn't want his son playing with a toy kitchen so a grill was a nice compromise. They placed in on the screened in porch nearby dad's grill so they go outside and grill together. It is great quality for the price and seems to be very weather resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin S.

customer_reviews.title: Review 1 of 2 🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: Okay so my box came without the stickers for pizza and grill racks and stove top stuff also without any screws to keep it all together . I did request a new one which they sent without hesitation so will open that to see if it’s all good . To be continued
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Super cute.
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute. I was worried it might be too small for our grandson. Im told he's tall for 2. Its a nice size. Seems sturdy. I know he'll love it. When we get to see him again after the "social distancing" lol.
customer_reviews.author: Seashell OsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Well designed
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves this barbeque. He has been using it for several years. I questioned the durability a little but when I put it together but it hasn't broken and it is still a delight for the kids to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: This is a Great Grill Set for kids!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter who is almost 2. She LOVES it! It was not difficult to put together. This Mom put it together within about an hour. The instructions make it easy. It is a great size and lots of fun. I ordered extra plastic items to use to play with this and really did not need them. It comes with plates, plastic ware, mustard, ketchup, hot dog, hamburger and cups The knobs click which makes it fun for them too. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you know if it’s a second party that you are using.
customer_reviews.text: I did not like that we had to go through a second party and most of the pieces were missing it has taken us a while to get the rest of the pieces and this was a gift to my grandson. Not happy at all. Next time I will open the box and look through everything before I give it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: The birthday boy was 6 this was a little short for him but he can still reach everything perfectly. His brother is eight and his sister is 9 there are also playing with it I recommend getting the little apron. It took about an hour to put together but that was because we didn't have a drill there are no pre drilled holes. Dad said there was no missing pieces!
customer_reviews.author: lopezt

customer_reviews.title: Toddler loves this
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 18 month old boy. He loves playing with it and is quickly grasping pretend play. It was very easy to assemble. My only complaint is the construction of the oven door which is very difficult to open close. It is also a big temptation for my toddler to stand on the door, so I imagine it will break off soon. Otherwise I would recommend this product, especially at the price point.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & holding up to steady use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grand nephew for his birthday. He really loves it & cooks for family every day. Seems to be sturdy & holding up very well to constant use.
customer_reviews.author: DEE 331

customer_reviews.title: Sizzling!
customer_reviews.text: Since my husband is a BBQ Master I decided to buy this for my Grandson! OMG....he loves it. This works out perfect when my husband is out BBQing my grandson is near him pretending he can do what his PAPA does! Too cute!
customer_reviews.author: Darla P

customer_reviews.title: Cool grill
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 18 month old to play with and she does, kind of. The size is perfect for her. My 7yr old has pretty much taken over the toy. She loves it. She loves to cook for everyone. It didn't take that long to assemble and the quality is ok.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor barbecue set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grand child for his birthday, he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Hollergirl

customer_reviews.title: Instructions were clear and it feels sturdy. I think 2 of the holes for screws ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves playing with this. Instructions were clear and it feels sturdy. I think 2 of the holes for screws on the back were not pre-drilled like they're supposed to be (or maybe it's supposed to be not pre-drilled) but the screws went through anyways and it all works. Good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Badger48

customer_reviews.title: BBQ
customer_reviews.text: The play set is nice it self, but I ordered with toys together at the same time, and I got the toys 6 days later ( I wanted them at the same time, supposed to be a gift. Make sure you see your delivery date for toys if you order them together.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Little buddy loves it
customer_reviews.text: It’s adorable and very cute. My nephew adores this toy. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Tiedemann

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: Really cute grill set. My 2 year old grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Not happy returning this
customer_reviews.text: Not happy returning this. It is very flimsy, will not hold up to any kind of use. Took it out of the box and the door wouldn't stay closed. Not up to usual "little Tykes" quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cross trek mama

customer_reviews.title: This grill is great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This grill is great for the price. Its big enough for two. My one year old and tall 3 year old can both use together and both reach everything. Wish is came with a few more accessories though. There arent any utensils and only one of each hotdog and hamburger unlike their grilling kits.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole L Hooper

customer_reviews.title: He's getting really good at playing "pretend"
customer_reviews.text: It's really cute. I purchased it for my grandson (18 mos) to have out on our deck. He does play with it - it's just that the food is so slippery! The hamburgers slide right off the puns, etc. Sounds silly, but it's hard to use the utensils. He's getting really good at playing "pretend". He loves the plates, cups, fawcet and the knobs turn and make click sounds. All in all - i think he will get a lot of enjoyment out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Nana1229

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: My three-year-old grandson and his fight for your own sister Are really in Joanne hiking with us
customer_reviews.author: Lh

customer_reviews.title: missing parts
customer_reviews.text: received item. when opened (was a present) the screws and instructions were missing. also some food parts. requested a replacement. based on replacement, I may change the rating.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love it! Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My almost 2 year old loves this grill! Perfect size and is pretty sturdy. There are enough accessories (spatula, tongs, play food, etc) to keep his attention, but not a million little things that will end up all over the house (we throw everything into the storage shelves and pizza oven at the end of the night. Great set for the price, too. Only con is the hamburger+bun and hot dog+bun are very smooth on the outside and do not stay together when you play with them.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Southard

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and realistic for a 4 yr old. Quality product. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Nice set but Strap it to something!
customer_reviews.text: Nice play set,cute and fun, but tips over easily, we had to strap it to something so my baby didn't pull it on top of him - also the lid to the grill was removed completely by my 12 month old within two days but goes back on so not a deal breaker !
customer_reviews.author: Meleah & Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: My son received this for his second birthday. He has a very short attention span (even with TV) and played with this for 40 minutes straight the first time I set it up. One month later it's still his #1 toy! I rated it 4 stars since it barely comes with any food. I would recommend buying extra to supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Thunderboltga

customer_reviews.title: Durable, creative fun play.
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved Little Tikes products. This grill set we got for our grandson for his 3rd birthday. My daughter has told me that he absolutely loves it and plays with it all the time. With this being the video game age anything that sparks creativity is great in my book!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Putman

customer_reviews.title: They have loved it! I love that there is a place ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids(2.5 and 16 months) recieved this for Christmas. They have loved it! I love that there is a place for everything and the kids love that they have a grill like dads. They are constantly making stuff for us and enjoy it. My kids are tall and while many of the reviews I read said it was super short I don't find the height a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice grill. My 2 year old son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Nice grill. My 2 year old son loves it. Some of the utensils are a little difficult for him to put away on the hooks. Good product for the inexpensive price.
customer_reviews.author: MomOfFour19to2

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect and he loves it
customer_reviews.text: Well now, I was worried for one thing about the height of the grill as compared to how tall or grandson is. We got pictures of him with it all put together, and needless to say my worries were for nothing. It's perfect and he loves it. My daughter-in-law and son are looking forward to putting it out on the deck so he can grill along side of his Dad.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen B.

customer_reviews.title: My little one loves the grill.
customer_reviews.text: Such a great purchase for my 18 month old son. He plays with this all the time and loves putting things in the "oven" and on "the grill". I highly recommend this toy for any little boy or girl.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor play bbq!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves playing with all the foods, and making the knobs "click"! It was fast and easy to assemble, although the stickers were a little tricky (especially the bigger ones).
customer_reviews.author: Marci Ruettgers

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for my 2 1/2 year old grandson. He loves it. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda V. Anton

customer_reviews.title: The Kids played with this thing forever.
customer_reviews.text: We gave it to a friend for there little one. and now he plays with it
customer_reviews.author: J.M.C

customer_reviews.title: bought this for my grandson's second birthday and he couldn't ...
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my grandson's second birthday and he couldn't even wait for grandpa and daddy to put it together to play with it!
customer_reviews.author: Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to large kitchen sets!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Christmas for my almost 2 year old! It’s a little shorter than a regular kitchen set would be, but he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All in all, it's just perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I've been eyeing toddler grills for a while. This one was not showing in searches because the word "grill" was not in the title. My son is not quite 3 and he enjoys playing with this. My nieces, ages 19 months, 3 and 4 also enjoy it. It has much more surface space than others I''ve seen. The height is good. Took 5 minutes to set up with no drill. Durable. Light weight so I can move it between rooms. I felt the price was great for a Little Times product.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mains

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for the money
customer_reviews.text: Really cute item. My 7 year old daughter purchased this item for a spot in her club house that was not very big. Fits perfect! Make sure you look at the dimensions before you buy it. It is a bit on the short side.
customer_reviews.author: Rogers Fam

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this bbq. Very cute, durable, and lots of accessories included. It will be well used.
customer_reviews.author: Sara McDougall

customer_reviews.title: Great set! I got it for my 2 year ...
customer_reviews.text: Great set! I got it for my 2 year old son for Christmas and he loves it! I bought an additional food set to go with it and its a great purchase for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: MommyCourtney

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly and lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Took me less than 30 minutes. Tried other products before and had to return them since it took forever to assemble. Kids love it, playing pretend bbq for hours
customer_reviews.author: Kobe Rahav

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Missing the hardware, instructions, and stickers. Very disappointed in Christmas eve when this couldn't be out together the way it was supposed to be.
customer_reviews.author: T Huffstutler

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this grill for my little brother and he absolutely loves it. Shipped very fast, but the food came separate. It's a little pricey but it's worth seeing the smile on his face! Toys like these definitely last a long time, too!
customer_reviews.author: jo anna novak

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 1 year old Grandson
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 1 year old Grandson. Very sturdy; not tippy at all and was easy to put together. He will have many years of enjoyment. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: L. Liebersbach

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Great outdoor toy
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great outdoor toy! The stickers do fade and come off fairly quickly. Only had for 1 summer and they are all almost gone but that doesn't matter to my 2 year old who likes to grill when mommy and daddy do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t include all parts
customer_reviews.text: So we go to put it together on Christmas Eve and it’s missing all the stickers and the screws. Disappointed and frustrated. 👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: He's only 1 years old but it's perfect and sturdy enough for him to pull himself up ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grand nephew and he loves it! I did purchase the extra food to go with it. He's only 1 years old but it's perfect and sturdy enough for him to pull himself up and play. His parents said putting it together was very easy. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Densel

customer_reviews.title: Cute and durable
customer_reviews.text: This bbq pit is easy to assemble and sturdy. It is big enough for two children to play at the same time. The features are really detailed and promote good pretend play.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Christmas gift for my 4 year old son & he absolutely loves it. He can grill just like his dad now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment on Christmas morning!
customer_reviews.text: This item was opened by my grandson on Christmas day and we discovered that an accessory package was missing containing toy food and cooking implements , faucet, knobs, faucet fastener and tool hook. What a disappointment! Now I discover that since I shopped early, it is now too late to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Wrong part
customer_reviews.text: When I received this it had the wrong cooktop. I called and was on the phone for about 45 minutes making sure she understood what part I needed. Waited a week and was sent the wrong part. Called again and spent another 45 minutes explaining the correct part. Waited another week and finally got the correct part. After all that kids do love it!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph R. Altergott

customer_reviews.title: this is great. Fits nicely into a little corner and doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: The lid for the grill tends to come off a lot but other than that, this is great. Fits nicely into a little corner and doesn't take up much room.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan M. Dombrowski

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest toy BBQ around! I just set it up last night for my child and I was really impressed with the quality and attention to detail. I really like how the plastic was textured which gave it character. This product is a win!
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: It's the perfect size for a small room and a 2yr old
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves playing with this. It's the perfect size for a small room and a 2yr old.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Adams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to play with while his mom is cooking dinner.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 2 year old grandson. His dad didn’t want us to buy him a kitchen so we found this. It’s so fun and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Parents said it was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a birthday gift for my two year old nephew. He absolutely LOVES it and plays with it all the time. Parents said it was easy to put together, just a few minutes! It is the perfect size for him but I think it would be fine for older and would probably keep the attention of children up to 6 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Suburban Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t come with everything it was supposed to!
customer_reviews.text: My son was patiently waiting for this, we get it and there are no instructions, no hardware, and none of the stickers were included.
customer_reviews.author: J. Edmett

customer_reviews.title: Kiddo approved
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves this thing! It’s a great size, not too big or small.

customer_reviews.text: Our Grandkids love it. It was pretty easy to put together and very light weight so it can be moved around for outside play.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: came very quickly- very easy to put together as well. my 3yr old niece loves it!

customer_reviews.text: Kids seem to like it. Just big enough for a 4 year old. Assembly requires you to put holes in the plastic, so my mother in law had a hard time assembling it.

customer_reviews.title: Cute play time grill
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute play grill. My grson loves to act like he is cooking so this will be a great birthday gift for him. Would definitely order this again.

customer_reviews.title: Company great to work with
customer_reviews.text: Product came defective. Company great to work with. Hassle free replacement.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size for My Toddler
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two year old. It's the perfect size and she loves playing with it.

customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice set. My son really wanted a "kitchen toy" and not that I care, but they usually are all in hot pink then I came across this. It was perfect. He loves it.

customer_reviews.text: My toddler was over the moon excited to get this toy. He has been playing with it nonstop. It was easy to assemble without a drill only a Phillips screwdriver, and I am a woman with limited experience with assembly.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Plenty of room for a 5 year old, 3 year old and 1 year old to play.

customer_reviews.text: The grandkids love it. I have a 6 & 4 year grand daughters & they play with it all the time.

customer_reviews.text: My daughter has really enjoyed playing with this. She is 20 months old and is a perfect size for her.

customer_reviews.text: Great kitchen for boys, my 3 year old and my 1 year old love this so much.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our great grandson loves it and that is all that matters.

customer_reviews.title: Great for 6 months - 4 years
customer_reviews.text: We actually set this up inside. Our 3 year old has been using it since he was 2 and our 11 month old has been using it since he was 6 months! We have purchased it again as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Pinkerman

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old granddaughter loves it. Easy to assemble and really strong and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Gift for 1-1/2 year old, still popular 6+ months later!
customer_reviews.text: This has held up really well - 6+ months with a 2 year old also using it as a workbench :-/ It's well built and so much fun for him to play with. It wasn't too hard to put together but having a drill and drill bit is a must. The holes aren't pre-drilled so that's up to you to do. I was a pretty proud mom to put this together myself! (using my husbands tools...) Also, read the directions re: sticker placement - I got ahead of myself and started sticking to my hearts desire. Bad idea, read the directions!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri P.

customer_reviews.title: All the children coming to the house enjoy playing with
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was so excited when he first saw it, that he insisted on cooking with me for 3 hours. All the children coming to the house enjoy playing with it

customer_reviews.title: They love it for their new play house
customer_reviews.text: Shipped to Grandkids. They love it for their new play house!

customer_reviews.title: Adorable & entertaining
customer_reviews.text: My 13 month old LOVES this grill set! Highly recommended for children who love play kitchens!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year loves it and she can grow into it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This was our son's biggest Christmas gift and so he opened it first, and hardly looked at anything else! Very easy assembly and lightweight too. Glad we got it!
customer_reviews.author: Mandi Sue Shick

customer_reviews.title: Great toy. Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Great toy. Excellent value. My grandson loves it!! Burger and hotdog shapes could be redesigned. Don't fit well on bun. Other than that, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Marianthi Koritsaris

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this play grill for a family member. He never stop playing with hit.hamburgers for everyone. 🤣
customer_reviews.author: Melila

product_meta.title: Little Tikes Cook 'n Play Outdoor BBQ
product_meta.description:
The perfect Cook 'n Play Outdoor BBQ for both girls and boys! This Cook 'n Play Outdoor BBQ is great for creative and imaginary play, while promoting social interaction for everyday fun.

BRAND STORY
By Little Tikes

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The perfect Cook 'n Play Outdoor BBQ for both girls and boys! This Cook 'n Play Outdoor BBQ is great for creative and imaginary play, while promoting social interaction for everyday fun.

See more
feature_bullets: Working oven and fridge doors; Molded-in pegs to hang kitchen utensils and pans
Clicking knobs on grill make fun sounds!
Molded-in sink and cooktop for added creative role play
Extended counter space and back counter for plenty of "prep" play!
Dual-level grill, just like real ones!
